categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: The Ord Cestus Squad consisted of five clone troopers, which consisted of a communications expert (Seefor), a pilot (Xutoo), a logistics expert (Sirty) and a physical training expert (Forry), and an ARC trooper (A-98). They aided Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi and Kit Fisto on their mission to stop the droid foundry on Ord Cestus.
This squad has never been officially named; the placeholder title is derived from the location of the squad's only known mission.
